Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

 Radio de Dios – Christian Radio Streaming


1. Privacy and personal data
 We respect your privacy. This application does not collect sensitive personal information. Some technical data may be automatically processed to improve app performance, display relevant advertisements, and generate anonymous analytics.


2. Advertising and monetization
 This app uses advertising to keep the service free. Users may unlock a Premium ad-free experience for 30 minutes through rewarded ads, with a maximum limit of 5 videos per day. This option is completely optional and does not require any purchases.


3. Christian content
 Radio de Dios is a Christian radio service focused on Latin America, especially Guatemala. The content is religious, spiritual, and family-friendly.


4. Children protection
 This application is suitable for all ages. It does not contain violent, sexual, or inappropriate material for children and complies with Google Play’s child safety policies.


5. Copyright and DMCA
 We respect copyright laws. If you believe any content infringes intellectual property rights (DMCA), please contact us for review and possible removal.


6. Limitation of liability
 Radio de Dios does not guarantee uninterrupted service availability, as it depends on external streaming sources and internet connectivity. Use of the app is at the user’s own responsibility.


7. Contact
 For legal inquiries, support, privacy concerns, or copyright requests, please contact us at:
 ventas@neopunto.com

resources.string: Para escuchar la radio sin interrupciones, permite que la app funcione en segundo plano.
¿Permitir que Radio de Dios te envíe notificaciones?

Debido a que es una aplicación cristiana, eliminamos anuncios de manera gratuita mediante un botón en la parte superior. Al ver un video publicitario de 30 segundos, eliminas todos los anuncios molestos durante 30 minutos. También puedes donar para eliminarlos permanentemente.
